author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (49 Photos)
text:
18 19 
theCHIVE closed out SXSW with a 3 day party on the rooftop of the Westin Downtown . 10,000 Chivers, 25 bands, and 1 giant hangover. Thanks to everybody who helped make our SXSW event the place to be this year. 20 
Last week, the Westin Downtown Austin announced it would be the first hotel to carry Chive TV in every single one of its guest rooms. Chive TV has now become the fastest growing DOOH technology in the world, from Royal Caribbean to Westin hotels, weâ€™ve taken entertainment to brave new heights. 
Since it was announced, dozens of hotels have quickly followed suit to get the entertaining and family-friendly Chive TV installed in their hotels. You can contact us right here to stay one giant leap ahead of your competition. Advertisement
